decisions.description: Checks validity of recipient email address.
decisions.name: Valid_Email_Check
decisions.label: Valid Email Check

formulas.name: emailList
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Contact__r.Email} + (IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.AdditionalRecipients__c})),"," + {!$Record.AdditionalRecipients__c}, "")) + (IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!forAmCcEmail})),"," + {!forAmCcEmail}, "")) + (IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_User_Record.Email})),"," + {!Get_User_Record.Email}, ""))

formulas.name: forApexFault
formulas.expression: LEFT(("An unexpected error has occurred in Salesforce. Please reach out to commercialtools@adyen.com with: " + {!forDebugLogEventStackTrace} + " || MondaySync__c: " + {!$Record.Id}),255)

formulas.name: forDebugLogEventMessage
formulas.expression: LEFT(("Fault Message: " + {!$Flow.FaultMessage}), 32000)

formulas.name: forDebugLogEventStackTrace
formulas.expression: LEFT(("Flow: PostProjectSurveyEmail || Step: " + {!forFaultStepName}), 255)

formulas.name: forDebugLogRecordIdOrData
formulas.expression: LEFT(("MondaySync__c :" + {!$Record.Id}), 255)

formulas.name: forEmailAlreadySentError
formulas.expression: "A Post Project Survey has already been sent for this Project in the last six months. Please reach out to Alperen Erkek with any questions."

formulas.name: forEmailSent
formulas.expression: "Email has been sent successfully on: " + TEXT({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})

formulas.name: forEmailSubject
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.MondayLanguage__c}, 'Spanish', {!EmailSubjectForSpanish}, 'French', {!EmailSubjectForFrench}, 'Italian', {!EmailSubjectForItalian}, 'Portuguese (BR)', {!EmailSubjectForPortugueseBr}, 'Portuguese (PT)', {!EmailSubjectForPortuguesePt}, 'German', {!EmailSubjectForGerman}, 'Polish', {!EmailSubjectForPolish}, {!EmailSubjectForEnglish}) + {!$Record.MondayItemName__c}

formulas.name: forFieldValidationError
formulas.expression: "One or both of the Sender and Main Recipient email addresses seem to be invalid. Please review these values, and reach out to commercialtools@adyen.com if you believe there is an issue."

formulas.name: forIncompatibleProjectError
formulas.expression: "This project is not compatible with the new survey flow. Please send the survey using the former method."

formulas.description: Returns TRUE if email is not valid
formulas.name: forInvalidEmail
formulas.expression: OR(CONTAINS({!$Record.ContactEmail__c}, ","), NOT(CONTAINS({!$Record.ContactEmail__c}, "@")))

formulas.name: forInvalidEmailError
formulas.expression: "The provided Contact Email appears to be invalid: " + {!$Record.ContactEmail__c}

formulas.description: Error when no Handover record is found, or if it is not related to an Account.
formulas.name: forInvalidHandover
formulas.expression: "The provided Handover Id appears to be invalid, or does not have a related Account. Please check the provided value, and reach out to Alperen Erkek with any questions."

formulas.name: forLastSixMonths
formulas.expression: {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-180

formulas.name: forMissingContactError
formulas.expression: LEFT(("Please check the Main Recipient email. If it is correct, then the contact may not exist on the account. Enter the Main Recipient First and Last Names, then click the Send button once more."),255)

formulas.name: forMissingRequiredFieldsError
formulas.expression: "Please make sure all required fields are populated for triggering the Survey email from Salesforce: Owner Email, Contact Email, Handover Id, Original Item Id."

formulas.name: forMissingSenderError
formulas.expression: LEFT(("The provided Sender email does not belong to an active user in Salesforce: " + {!$Record.OwnerEmail__c} + ". If you believe there is a problem, please contact commercialtools@adyen.com."),255)

formulas.name: forNotPilotAccountError
formulas.expression: "This Project is not related to an Account select for the Post Project Survey Pilot. Please reach out to Alperen Erkek with any questions."

formulas.name: forTemplateLanguageSelection
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.MondayLanguage__c}, 'Spanish', {!EmailTemplateForSendSpanish}, 'French', {!EmailTemplateForSendFrench}, 'Italian', {!EmailTemplateForSendItalian}, 'Portuguese (PT)', {!EmailTemplateForSendPortuguesePt}, 'Portuguese (BR)', {!EmailTemplateForSendPortugueseBr}, 'German', {!EmailTemplateForSendGerman}, 'Polish', {!EmailTemplateForSendPolish}, {!EmailTemplateForSendEnglish})

formulas.name: forTooManyRecipients
formulas.expression: CONTAINS({!$Flow.FaultMessage},"too many additional emails")

formulas.name: forTooManyRecipientsError
formulas.expression: "The email failed to send due to too many recipients. Please make sure you have not included more than two additional Recipient Emails."

formulas.name: forUrlContactEmail
formulas.expression: IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Contact_Record.Id})),{!Get_Contact_Record.Email}, {!RecipientEmail})

formulas.name: forUrlContactId
formulas.expression: IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Contact_Record.Id})),{!Get_Contact_Record.Id}, {!CreateContact})

recordUpdates.description: Used to validate unique Ids and email fields synced from Monday.
recordUpdates.name: ValidateFields
recordUpdates.label: Validate Fields

start.filterLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7)

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendEnglish
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName},


At Adyen we constantly strive to improve our services and we would like to hear your honest feedback about your recent project experience with us. We've prepared a short survey with a few questions for you, which will only take a few minutes to complete (we promise!). We would really appreciate you taking the time to help us out.


You can find the survey here. Of course, if there are any questions or comments please don’t hesitate to reach out.


Best regards,

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendFrench
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName}, 


Chez Adyen, nous cherchons constamment à vous offrir un meilleur service. C’est pourquoi nous aimerions connaître votre avis honnête sur la récente expérience de projet avec nous. Nous avons préparé une enquête comportant quelques questions auxquelles nous aimerions que vous répondiez. Cela ne devrait prendre que quelques minutes, c’est promis ! 


Nous vous serions très reconnaissants de prendre le temps de nous aider. 


Vous trouverez l’enquête ici. Bien entendu, si vous avez des questions ou des commentaires, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter. 


Cordialement,

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendGerman
textTemplates.text:
Hallo {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName},


Wir bei Adyen sind ständig bestrebt, unsere Dienstleistungen zu verbessern und würden gerne Ihr ehrliches Feedback zu Ihrer letzten Projekterfahrung mit uns hören. Wir haben eine kurze Umfrage vorbereitet, bei der wir dir einige Fragen stellen möchten. Es wird wirklich nur ein paar Minuten dauern. 


Wir würden uns sehr freuen, wenn Sie sich etwas Zeit nehmen könnten, um uns zu helfen. 


Die Umfrage finden Sie hier. Wenn Sie Fragen haben oder uns etwas mitteilen möchten, dann stehen wir Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung. 


Mit freundlichen Grüßen

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendItalian
textTemplates.text:
Ciao {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName}, 


in Adyen ci impegniamo costantemente a migliorare i nostri servizi e vorremmo ricevere feedback sincero sulla tua recente esperienza di progetto con noi. Abbiamo creato un breve sondaggio con alcune domande per te, che richiederà soltanto qualche minuto per essere completato. 


Ti saremmo davvero grati se trovassi il tempo per aiutarci. 


Il sondaggio è disponibile qui. Naturalmente, se hai domande o commenti, non esitare a contattarci. 


Cordiali saluti,

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendPolish
textTemplates.text:
Cześć {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName}, 


W Adyen nieustannie staramy się poprawiać jakość naszych usług i chcielibyśmy poznać Twoją szczerą opinię na temat Twoich ostatnich wrażeń z realizowanego z nami projektu. Przygotowaliśmy dla Ciebie krótką ankietę z kilkoma pytaniami, której wypełnienie zajmie tylko kilka minut (słowo honoru!). 


Będziemy bardzo wdzięczni, jeżeli poświęcisz swój czas, aby nam pomóc. 


Ankieta znajduje się tutaj. Jeśli oczywiście masz pytania czy uwagi, prosimy o kontakt z nami. 


Z pozdrowieniami

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendPortugueseBr
textTemplates.text:
Olá {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName}, 


Na Adyen, buscamos a melhoria contínua de nossos serviços e gostaríamos de ouvir comentários sinceros sobre sua experiência de projeto conosco. Preparamos uma breve pesquisa com algumas perguntas para você, e ela pode ser respondida em apenas alguns minutos (nós prometemos!). 


Ficaremos imensamente agradecidos pelo tempo que você puder contribuir para nos ajudar. 


Você pode acessar a pesquisa aqui. Sinta-se à vontade para entrar em contato conosco a fim de sanar quaisquer dúvidas ou fazer comentários. 


Atenciosamente,

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendPortuguesePt
textTemplates.text:
Olá, {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName}, 


Na Adyen esforçamo-nos constantemente por melhorar os nossos serviços e gostaríamos de saber a sua opinião honesta sobre a sua recente experiência em projetos connosco. Preparámos um pequeno inquérito com algumas perguntas para si, que demorará apenas alguns minutos a preencher (prometemos!). 


Gostaríamos muito que nos ajudasse. 


Pode preencher o inquérito aqui. Se tiver dúvidas ou comentários, não hesite em contactar-nos. 


Atenciosamente,

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateForSendSpanish
textTemplates.text:
Hola, {!Get_Contact_Record.FirstName}, 


En Adyen nos esforzamos por mejorar nuestros servicios y nos gustaría conocer tu opinión sincera sobre tu reciente experiencia en un proyecto con nosotros. Hemos preparado una breve encuesta con algunas preguntas que podrás completar en tan solo unos minutos (¡lo prometemos!). 

Te agradeceríamos que dedicaras unos minutos a ayudarnos. 


Aquí puedes encontrar la encuesta. Por supuesto, si tienes cualquier pregunta o comentario, no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros. 


Un saludo,

{!Get_User_Record.Name}

value.stringValue: Per noi la tua opinione è importante
Twoja opinia ma dla nas znaczenie
Sua opinião é importante para nós
Sua opinião é importante para nós
Su opinión es importante para nuestra mejora continua

variables.description: Describes at which step the fault occurred.
variables.name: forFaultStepName

variables.description: Org-wide Email Addressed from which the email is sent.
variables.name: forOrgWideEmailAddress
